## Disposable class

Base class for any Disposable class

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Disposable extends Observable<{
    dispose: [];
}> implements IDisposable 
```
**Extends:** [Observable](doc/markdown/./base.observable.md)<!-- -->&lt;{ dispose: \[\]; }&gt;

**Implements:** [IDisposable](doc/markdown/./base.idisposable.md)
